title: Huge ms in game
body: From like 7:30 Pm 2/18/2017 i have 180+ ms , and i can`t understand why...I played today from 12:00 to 2:00 and my ms was all right , like everytime (max 130) . Can someone help me ?

replies.body: The Hextech Repair Tool doesn`t seems to do anything , i have 181 ms :((

The repair tool isn't supposed to fix anything (misleading name I know), it does however generate logs of data that Riot can look at to pinpoint your exact issue. I am having recent ping issues, but throughout all the logs and information I provided we (Riot and I) discovered (through various tests and logs) that my wireless card was having issues communicating with the router all the time, which is to be expected since its a generic 2.4 ghz card with a tiny antenna a room and a half away from the router itself. I have a friend in the same house that is using a 5 ghz card and he isn't having these issues. Needless to say, I'll need an upgrade~
Well , idk what i did but now i have a decent ms , thank you <3

Nah , i wont resolve the problem...I tried that tool , i tried to change the cable , i tried to unplug modem and cable for 30 seconds and also restart the computer , but no results , i have same ping , it looks like i wont be able to play lol anymore... :(

My suggestion here would be to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot.  Hopefully, it will do the trick!
